resources.string: Challenge2
How about we do some chripin?
Can I get bird seed?
How about we migrate back to my home?
Peck slowly, we have all night
You hungry? I hungry!
You know what they say about big feet. Got real big ones!
I like someone who has a real apetite
Strong... Me likey!
Yes we can hook-up with dragons!
We royal critters.
I dislike we are called asses. We have other parts too.
Who ever jack is, shame on him.
Enough with the ride jokes please.
Yes I have seen Bojack.
I heard of all the mounting jokes too.
The old spice ad? That was me!
Il chase you all night long.
Handcufs are on tonight.
Id like to see some lisence. The other one.
Like a hound in uniform? Same here.
Polly does not want a cracker!
People say I repeat things. Word per word!
Iago is dreamy but nothing compared to you!
I like to wear colorful clothes.
I like a wild side!
You better have a backbone!
Kraken is my brother, so im cool too!
Dont ask me if im long. Trust me.
The pen is mighty but not without ink.
Im flexible. I can adjust.
Im spineless but I have a backbone!
The Japanese did a number to our reputation.
